title: Why Rice Cookers Take Longer Than Stovetop

items.name: Why the difference
items.details: Rice cookers use a more gradual process, regulating temperature and letting rice steam thoroughly. This longer cycle produces a more consistent texture compared to the faster boil-and-absorb stovetop method.

notes: The longer cook time in a rice cooker is by design, not a flaw. It leads to more evenly cooked rice with better texture consistency.
